name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-LG-75337
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker Building Set 75337
description: Recreate the Battle of Utapau with this fantastic LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker (75337). A great gift idea for Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith fans, this building toy features posable legs, a 360-degree-rotating elevating heavy blaster cannon with 2 stud shooters, a detachable minifigure cockpit and 2 detailed cabins with space for up to 7 LEGO minifigures in total. Each of the cabins opens for easy play and an extendable handle makes it simple to lift and move the AT-TE. The set includes 5 LEGO minifigures – Commander Cody, a 212th Clone Gunner and 3 212th Clone Troopers – to pit against 3 Battle Droid LEGO figures and a buildable Dwarf Spider Droid, plus assorted cool weapons.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-MTL-HCD51
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Dollhouses & Furniture
title: Barbie DreamHouse Pool Party Doll House with 75+ Accessories & 3-Story Slide
description: Dive into the ultimate pool party with the Barbie DreamHouse! This deluxe doll house has the tallest slide in the Barbie DreamHouse series to date, with a three-story spiral design for endless fun in the sun. It inspires 360-degree play with a wide and spacious floor plan, three levels, and 10 indoor and outdoor living areas. The playset also features more pet-friendly touches than ever before, including a puppy slide and a pool for furry friends to play in alongside Barbie doll!

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-HW-HGX10
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Race Tracks & Playsets
title: Hot Wheels Action Spiral Speed Crash Track Set
description: The Hot Wheels Action Spiral Speed Crash Track Set delivers big-time thrills with a 29-inch-tall track, three crash zones and a motorized booster that keeps the car moving. Drive the included Hot Wheels vehicle up to the booster and watch it continuously whip down the spiral. To increase the challenge, add additional cars until there's an inevitable wipeout in one of the crash zones.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-FP-GKH74
categories: Learning & STEM > Early Development Toys > Baby Walkers & Activity Centers
title: Fisher-Price Learn with Me Zebra Walker
description: From teaching first words to encouraging first steps, the Fisher-Price Learn with Me Zebra Walker is the kind of first friend you want for your little one! Spin, flip, roll, twist. This zebra's full of busy, hands-on activities for sitting babies. Your tot can turn the book page or press the light-up buttons to hear all about ABC's & 123's through sing-along songs and phrases with new animal friends! And when baby's learning to walk, the easy-grasp handle and sturdy 4-wheel base help steady those wobbly first steps.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-PD-24PACK
categories: Arts & Crafts > Modeling & Sculpting > Modeling Clay & Dough
title: Play-Doh Modeling Compound 24-Pack Case of Colors
description: Open a can of imagination! With a 24-pack of Play-Doh compound, the creative possibilities are endless. These 3-ounce cans are great for all kinds of creative play including gifts, activities, classroom projects, or to restock any Play-Doh color collection. The 24-pack of modeling compound also works well with Play-Doh tools and playsets (sold separately).

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-RF-1800
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Ride-On Toys > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon
description: The classic wagon with a rugged twist, the Radio Flyer All-Terrain Steel & Wood Wagon is built for adventure. The full-sized, all-steel seamless body with no-scratch edges and high wooden stake sides are perfect for hauling toys, gear, or your little ones. The real air tires provide a smooth ride on any terrain, while the extra-long handle folds under for easy storage.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-CATAN-3071
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Strategy & Role-Playing Games
Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Family Board Games
title: CATAN The Board Game (Base Game)
description: Embark on a quest to settle the isle of Catan! Guide your settlers to victory by clever trading and cunning development. Use resource combinations - grain, wool, ore, brick, and lumber - to buy development cards and build roads, settlements, and cities. Acquire your resources through trades, cards, or lucky dice rolls. But beware! Someone might cut off your road or play a monopoly card. Are you the best trader, builder, or settler? Will you be the first to 10 victory points?

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-MD-9397
categories: Toys & Games > Plush & Stuffed Animals > Giant Plush Animals
title: Melissa & Doug Giant Giraffe Lifelike Stuffed Animal
description: Awe-inspiring and lifelike, this giant plush giraffe brings a touch of the exotic into any environment. At over four feet tall, the giant giraffe is a statement piece and a cuddly friend. Its soft, cuddly body encourages hugs and imaginative play. Features sturdy wire-framed legs and a long, lovable neck, making it perfect for decorating a nursery or playroom.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VT-80-549500
categories: Video Games & Electronics > Kids' Electronics > Kids' Digital Cameras
title: VTech KidiZoom Creator Cam, HD Video Camera with Tripod
description: Be a kid-creator with the KidiZoom Creator Cam digital camera! Create awesome videos with this high-definition video camera kit. Use the included green screen and 20+ animated backgrounds to get chased by a T-Rex, go to outer space or make yourself disappear! Set up your shot with the tabletop tripod/selfie stick, then use the editing and creativity tools to create trick shots and time-lapse videos.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-NERF-F5032
categories: Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Playset Vehicles & Accessories
title: NERF Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 Blaster
description: Gear up for battle with Nerf Elite 2.0 blasters that feature built-in customizing capabilities so you can upgrade them and seize the advantage in Nerf competitions. The Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 blaster has 3 tactical rails, a barrel attachment point, and stock attachment point to customize the blaster for every Nerf game. The blaster has a 6-dart rotating drum so you can fire 6 darts in a row before reloading. Fire 1 dart at a time, or slam-fire all 6 darts in rapid succession. Includes 12 official Nerf darts.

title: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Sis
description: It's Puppy's sweet sister, Sis! This soft, cuddly friend responds to your baby's touch with exciting sing-along songs and phrases that introduce more than 100 first words, parts of the body, colors, shapes and more! And because every baby develops at their own pace, Sis comes with Smart Stages technology, so you can choose the level that's best for your child.

categories: Toys & Games > Pretend Play > Kitchens & Play Food
title: Melissa & Doug Wooden Scoop and Serve Ice Cream Counter - Deluxe Edition
description: A deluxe, all-wooden version of the favorite Scoop & Serve Ice Cream Counter. This 28-piece wooden ice cream play set features a sturdy wooden countertop, eight wooden scoops of different-flavored ice cream, six assorted toppings, two cones, a cup, an ice cream scooper, tongs, and a wooden spoon. The scooper fits into a hole on top of the scoops to lift, stack, and release.

description: Crank up the competition with this Monster Truck edition of the Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash track set! This sturdy elevated figure-eight track with four intersecting crash zones delivers amped up crashing action. The set includes one Hot Wheels Monster Truck and one 1:64 scale Hot Wheels vehicle to get the fun started.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-CATAN-WOOD
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Board Games
title: CATAN Board Game - Deluxe Wood Edition
description: Experience the classic game of CATAN like never before with this Deluxe Wood Edition. This heirloom-quality version features beautifully crafted 3D wooden tiles for terrain, settlements, cities, and roads. A must-have for the serious Catan enthusiast.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-FP-SAFARI
categories: Toys & Games > Preschool Toys > Little People
title: Fisher-Price Little People Caring for Animals Farm - Safari Friends Set
description: An exciting addition to the Caring for Animals Farm! This Safari Friends variant includes the classic farm playset plus an exclusive pack of safari animals: a friendly lion, a zebra, and a monkey. Toddlers can explore new animal sounds and imaginative play scenarios.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-HW-GLOW
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, RC, & Drones > Play Vehicles & Race Tracks
title: Hot Wheels Mario Kart Rainbow Road Raceway - Glow-in-the-Dark Track
description: Bring Rainbow Road to life in a whole new light! This special edition of the Hot Wheels Mario Kart Rainbow Road Raceway features glow-in-the-dark track pieces for thrilling nighttime races. The set includes an exclusive glow-painted King Boo and Mario die-cast karts.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-LG-DISPLAY
categories: Toys & Games > Building Sets & Blocks > LEGO
title: LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker 75337 - Collector's Edition with Display Case
description: The ultimate package for the dedicated LEGO Star Wars collector. This bundle includes the complete LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker (75337) set, plus a premium, custom-fit acrylic display case with a printed background of the Battle of Utapau to protect and showcase your creation.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-MD-150PC
categories: Toys & Games > Building Sets & Blocks > Wooden Blocks
title: Melissa & Doug Wooden Building Blocks Set - 150-Piece Deluxe Set
description: Expand your building horizons with the 150-Piece Deluxe Wooden Building Blocks Set from Melissa & Doug. This version offers 50 more blocks than the standard set, including new architectural shapes like arches and columns for bigger, more intricate structures.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-MTL-POLICE
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, RC, & Drones > Play Vehicles & Race Tracks
title: Matchbox Action Drivers Airport Adventure Playset - Police Air Patrol Theme
description: Patrol the skies with the Police Air Patrol themed version of the Matchbox Airport Adventure playset! This variant features a police station color scheme, a police helicopter instead of a commercial plane, and includes one exclusive Matchbox police car.
